name: OPEN the Key Item Chest in Kero Sewers
PERFORM 10 consecutive Super/Ultra Jumps
INFLICT a Status Effect on a Boss
SLEEP in the Suite and TIP the Bellhop
WORK at the Marrymore Hotel
UNLOCK Grate Guy's Casino
COMPLETE 3 Puzzles in the Sunken Ship
RESCUE 3 Allies
SELL 3 Eggs
OBTAIN 5 or more Flowers on Booster Hill
RESCUE an Ally from the Mines
OPEN the Chest above the swings in Rose Way
SPEND over 500 Coins on a single purchase
BANISH a Ghost with the Pure Water item
CAST Geno Whirl for 9999 Damage
FEED a Party Member to Belome
DEFEAT Johnny in a 1-on-1
COMPLETE 1+ Red Door(s)
SELL a Goodie Bag OR Coin Trick to Croco
COMPLETE the 3-D Maze in the Sunken Ship
READ 7 wishes on Star Hill
DEFEAT IN ORDER: Axem Yellow, Red, Black, Green, Pink
ATTACK a Chomp Enemy with a Chomp Weapon
FINISH with more than 50 FP
DEFEAT a Troopa and Heavy Troopa of the SAME Color
